languages.text: {n}Под вашими ногами — слетевшая со скомороха шутовская маска. Прикрыв руками морщинистое лицо, уродливый и озлобленный губернатор Тассеры поспешно поднимается на трясущиеся ноги.{/n}
{n}At your feet lies a gaudy mask that has fallen from the fool's face. Covering his wrinkled visage with both hands, the ugly and enraged governor of Thassera rises hastily on trembling legs.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Под вашими ногами — слетевшая со скомороха шутовская маска. Прикрыв руками морщинистое лицо, уродливый и озлобленный губернатор Тассеры поспешно поднимается на трясущиеся ноги.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A gaudy mask that has fallen off the clown's face lies under your feet. Covering his wrinkled face with both hands, the ugly and acerbate Governor of Thassera hastily rises on shaking feet.{/n}
{n}A gaudy mask that has fallen off the clown's face lies under your feet. Covering his wrinkled face with both hands, the ugly and acerbate Governor of Thassera hastily rises on shaking feet.{/n}
{n}At your feet lies a gaudy mask that has fallen from the clown's face. Covering his wrinkled visage with both hands, the ugly and shaken Governor of Thassera rises hastily on trembling legs.{/n}
{n}At your feet lies a gaudy mask that has fallen from the clown's face. Covering his wrinkled visage with both hands, the ugly and shaken Governor of Thassera rises hastily on trembling legs.{/n}
{n}At your feet lies a gaudy mask that has fallen from the fool's face. Covering his wrinkled visage with both hands, the ugly and enraged governor of Thassera rises hastily on trembling legs.{/n}
{n}At your feet lies a gaudy mask that has fallen from the fool's face. Covering his wrinkled visage with both hands, the ugly and enraged governor of Thassera rises hastily on trembling legs.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vor deinen Füßen liegt eine knallbunte Maske, die vom Gesicht des Narren fiel. Der hässliche und wütende Gouverneur von Thassera bedeckt sein faltiges Gesicht mit beiden Händen und steht mit zitternden Beinen hastig auf.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At your feet lies a gaudy mask that has fallen from the fool's face. Covering his wrinkled visage with both hands, the ugly and enraged governor of Thassera rises hastily on trembling legs.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vor deinen Füßen liegt eine knallbunte Maske, die vom Gesicht des Narren fiel. Der hässliche und wütende Gouverneur von Thassera bedeckt sein faltiges Gesicht mit beiden Händen und steht mit zitternden Beinen hastig auf.{/n}

languages.text: {n}À vos pieds se trouve le masque tape-à-l'œil que portait le bouffon. Fou de rage, le gouverneur de Thassera se relève hâtivement sur ses jambes tremblantes en couvrant son visage ridé de ses deux mains pour cacher sa laideur.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At your feet lies a gaudy mask that has fallen from the fool's face. Covering his wrinkled visage with both hands, the ugly and enraged governor of Thassera rises hastily on trembling legs.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}À vos pieds se trouve le masque tape-à-l'œil que portait le bouffon. Fou de rage, le gouverneur de Thassera se relève hâtivement sur ses jambes tremblantes en couvrant son visage ridé de ses deux mains pour cacher sa laideur.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你脚边丢着一张从小丑脸上剥落的华丽面具。塔瑟拉总督怒不可遏，双手捂住了满是皱纹的丑脸，双腿颤抖着，迅速站了起来。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At your feet lies a gaudy mask that has fallen from the fool's face. Covering his wrinkled visage with both hands, the ugly and enraged governor of Thassera rises hastily on trembling legs.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你脚边丢着一张从小丑脸上剥落的华丽面具。塔瑟拉总督怒不可遏，双手捂住了满是皱纹的丑脸，双腿颤抖着，迅速站了起来。{/n}

languages.text: {n}A tus pies yace la máscara extravagante que cubría el rostro del bufón. El gobernador feo y furioso de Thassera se cubre la cara arrugada con las manos mientras se levanta apresuradamente con piernas temblorosas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At your feet lies a gaudy mask that has fallen from the fool's face. Covering his wrinkled visage with both hands, the ugly and enraged governor of Thassera rises hastily on trembling legs.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A tus pies yace la máscara extravagante que cubría el rostro del bufón. El gobernador feo y furioso de Thassera se cubre la cara arrugada con las manos mientras se levanta apresuradamente con piernas temblorosas.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたの足元には、道化の顔から落ちたけばけばしい仮面があった。しわだらけの顔を両手で覆い、醜く怒りに満ちた表情のタッセーラの総督は、震える足で急いで立ち上がった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At your feet lies a gaudy mask that has fallen from the fool's face. Covering his wrinkled visage with both hands, the ugly and enraged governor of Thassera rises hastily on trembling legs.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたの足元には、道化の顔から落ちたけばけばしい仮面があった。しわだらけの顔を両手で覆い、醜く怒りに満ちた表情のタッセーラの総督は、震える足で急いで立ち上がった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ayaklarının dibinde, soytarının yüzünden düşmüş olan gösterişli bir maske yatıyor. Kırışık çehresini iki eliyle kapatan Thassera'nın çirkin ve öfkeli valisi, titreyen bacaklarıyla alelacele ayağa kalkıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At your feet lies a gaudy mask that has fallen from the fool's face. Covering his wrinkled visage with both hands, the ugly and enraged governor of Thassera rises hastily on trembling legs.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ayaklarının dibinde, soytarının yüzünden düşmüş olan gösterişli bir maske yatıyor. Kırışık çehresini iki eliyle kapatan Thassera'nın çirkin ve öfkeli valisi, titreyen bacaklarıyla alelacele ayağa kalkıyor.{/n}
